casebody.data:
Keith Wagner, Capitol Police Officer
v.
Pennsylvania Capitol Police Department, Department Of General Services, Gregory A. Green, Individually And In His Official Capacity As Director Of Bureau Of Human Resources, Richard Shaffer, In His Individual Capacity And As Acting As Superintendent Of Capitol Police, Robert J. Dillard, In His Individual Capacity And As Acting As Deputy Superintendent Of Capitol Police NO. 104 MAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania June 08, 2016 Appeal from the Commonwealth Court.

Disposition: Denied.
